health.title: Sick Leave
health.body: I want to bring it to your kind attention that I am seriously ill. I am having sever back-pain and this takes time to get recovered.  Due to this reason I am not able to come to office from <<<from_date>>> to <<<to_date>>>. I request you to kindly, sanction my sick leave for the mentioned dates

health.title: Sick Leave
health.body: I am not feeling well from past few days so I want to take off from <<<from_date>>> to <<<to_date>>>. I am available through all modes of communication.

wedding.title: Cousin's Wedding
wedding.body: I want to take leave from <<<from_date>>> to <<<to_date>>> for my cousin's wedding. I request you to approve the leaves for mentiioned dates

wedding.title: Sisters's Wedding
wedding.body: I want to take leave from <<<from_date>>> to <<<to_date>>> for my sister's wedding. I request you to approve the leaves for mentiioned dates
